name: Mark of the Master Assassin
description: While Stealth is active and for 5 sec after breaking Stealth, your Critical Strike chance is increased by 100%.

name: Tiny Toxic Blades
description: Shiv causes your Poisons and Bleeds on the target to spread to a nearby enemy.

name: Essence of Bloodfang
description: Your combo point generating abilities have a chance to infect the target with Bloodfang, causing 0 Bleed damage over 6 sec, and healing the Rogue for 0 each time it deals damage.

name: Invigorating Shadowdust
description: Vanish reduces the remaining cooldown of your other abilities by 15 sec.

name: Dashing Scoundrel
description: Envenom also increases the critical strike chance of your poisons by 30%, and their critical strikes generate 2 Energy.

name: Doomblade
description:
Mutilate deals an additional 20% Bleed damage over 8 sec.

Envenom damage increased by 5% for each Bleed you have on the target.

name: Zoldyck Insignia
description: Your Poisons and Bleeds deal 30% increased damage to targets below 30% health.

name: Duskwalker's Patch
description: The remaining cooldown on Vendetta is reduced by 1 sec for every 65 Energy you expend.

name: Greenskin's Wickers
description: Between the Eyes has a 20% chance per Combo Point to increase the damage of your next Pistol Shot by 200%.

name: Guile Charm
description: Take advantage of the natural ebb and flow of combat, causing your Sinister Strike to gradually increase your damage dealt by up to 30%. This maximum effect will last for 15 sec before fading and beginning the cycle anew.

name: Celerity
description: Adrenaline Rush increases your damage by 15%, and you have a chance while Slice and Dice is active to gain the Adrenaline Rush effect for 4 sec.

name: Concealed Blunderbuss
description: When Sinister Strike hits an additional time, there is a 33% chance that your next Pistol Shot will fire 3 additional times.

name: Finality
description: Eviscerate, Rupture, and Shadow Vault increase the damage of your next use of the finishing move by 20%.

name: Akaari's Soul Fragment
description: After using Shadowstrike or Cheap Shot, your target suffers a Shadowstrike from the shadows 2 sec later, at 50% effectiveness as Shadow damage.

name: The Rotten
description:
For 2 sec after activating Symbols of Death, your Shadowstrike and 

<condition>Gloomblade</condition>
<dynamic>Gloomblade</dynamic>

Backstab generate 4 additional combo points.

name: Deathly Shadows
description: Vanish grants 5 combo points and increases all damage dealt by 15% for 10 sec.
